title: Any idea which is this typeface?
content:
Is this typeface a grotesque or a geometric sans and which one is it?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020175117im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Athenaios_3656.png)
author: Nymus

comments.content:
I would say geometric.  
Similar to Montreal:  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/ef-typeshop/montreal/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020175117/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/ef-typeshop/montreal/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/ef-typeshop/montreal/")
Thanks Riccardo. It could also be Drescher Grotesk BT by the looks of it at [www.identifont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020175117/http:/www.identifont.com/ "www.identifont.com")
